title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Rask (2026). col2hex2col: Convert Color Names Hex Codes. R package version 0.5.1, https://github.com/AnttiRask/col2hex2col.
code: @Manual{,   title = {col2hex2col: Convert Between Color Names and Hex Codes},   author = {Antti Rask},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.5.1},   url = {https://github.com/AnttiRask/col2hex2col}, }

title: col2hex2col
text: col2hex2col provides fast simple functions convert color names hexadecimal color codes. package now supports extensive database 32,000 color names, including 657 R built-colors plus comprehensive color-names database. name playful reference “2 Fast 2 Furious” - color conversion fun fast!

title: col2hex2col
text: Install stable version CRAN: install development version GitHub:

what: Convert color names to hex codes
title: col2hex2col
code: library(col2hex2col)  # Single color color_to_hex("red") #> [1] "#FF0000"  # Multiple colors color_to_hex(c("red", "blue", "green")) #> [1] "#FF0000" "#0000FF" "#00FF00"  # Works with all 657 R color names color_to_hex(c("skyblue", "coral", "chartreuse")) #> [1] "#87CEEB" "#FF7F50" "#7FFF00"  # Also works with 32,000+ extended color names! color_to_hex(c("sunset orange", "arctic ocean")) #> [1] "#FD5E53" "#66C3D0"

what: Convert hex codes to color names
title: col2hex2col
code: # Single hex code hex_to_color("#FF0000") #> [1] "red"  # Multiple hex codes hex_to_color(c("#FF0000", "#0000FF", "#00FF00")) #> [1] "red"   "blue"  "green"  # Case insensitive hex_to_color("#ff0000") #> [1] "red"

title: col2hex2col
text: hex code doesn’t exact match database, hex_to_color() automatically finds nearest named color using LAB color distance. requires optional farver package.
code: # Hex code without exact match - finds nearest named color hex_to_color("#859900") #> [1] "bioshock" #> Warning: Hex value(s) #859900 have no exact match; falling back using lab distance.  # Disable fallback to get NA for unmatched colors hex_to_color("#859900", fallback_nearest_color = FALSE) #> [1] NA  # Install farver for fallback support install.packages("farver")

title: col2hex2col
code: # Color -> Hex -> Color colors <- c("red", "blue", "green") hex_codes <- color_to_hex(colors) hex_to_color(hex_codes) #> [1] "red"   "blue"  "green"

what: Explore and visualize the color database
title: col2hex2col
text: create_color_table() function creates interactive table visual color swatches, making easy explore select colors projects.
code: # Get all 32,462 colors as a data frame colors_df <- get_color_data() head(colors_df) #>                          name     hex    lab_l     lab_a     lab_b #> 1                     100 mph #C93F38 47.31632 54.067012  35.32651 #> 2          18th century green #A59344 61.03262 -3.367873  43.49787 #> 3              1975 earth red #7B463B 35.80671 21.453625  16.44115 #> 4          1989 miami hotline #DD3366 50.33896 66.911465  12.43714 #> 5 20000 leagues under the sea #191970 15.85760 31.715801 -49.57238 #> 6           21st century blue #7FB9DD 72.51353 -9.503429 -23.94186  # Note: LAB columns (lab_l, lab_a, lab_b) are included when the farver package is installed  # Find specific colors blue_colors <- colors_df[grepl("blue", colors_df$name), ] nrow(blue_colors) #> [1] 1815  # Create a beautiful color swatch table (requires gt package) create_color_table(head(colors_df, 9))

title: col2hex2col
text: Extensive Database: 32,000+ color names including R colors color-names database Nearest Color Fallback: Automatically finds closest named color exact match exists (requires optional farver package) Data Export: Access complete color database data frame optional LAB color coordinates exploration analysis Visual Tables: Create beautiful color swatch tables optional gt package Fast: Pre-built lookup tables instant color conversion Simple: Intuitive functions remember Backward Compatible: R colors prioritized, ensuring existing code works unchanged Case Insensitive: “Red”, “red”, “RED” work Vectorized: Works single values vectors Validated: Comprehensive input validation error messages Tested: Extensive test coverage testthat

title: col2hex2col
text: Minimal dependencies: Core functionality uses pure base R; optional packages (farver, gt) enhance features Extensive coverage: 32,000+ color names vs ~657 base R Optimized performance: Pre-built lookup tables instant conversion Backward compatible: R colors prioritized, ensuring existing code works Well-documented: Complete function documentation examples

title: col2hex2col
text: create_color_table() function inspired question Nehal Darakhshan LinkedIn visualizing color palettes. Thank ! extended color database (32,000+ colors) comes David Aerne’s color-names project. Thank maintaining excellent resource! nearest color fallback functionality contributed iamYannC. Thank great addition!

what: col2hex2col: Convert Between Color Names and Hex Codes — col2hex2col-package
title: col2hex2col: Convert Between Color Names and Hex Codes — col2hex2col-package
text: Provides simple functions convert color names hexadecimal color codes using extensive database 32,000 colors. Includes 657 R built-colors plus comprehensive color-names database. package supports bidirectional conversion backward compatibility, prioritizing R colors available.

title: col2hex2col: Convert Between Color Names and Hex Codes — col2hex2col-package
text: col2hex2col package provides functions working color names hexadecimal color codes: Core Conversion Functions: color_to_hex: Converts color names hex codes hex_to_color: Converts hex codes color names Data Visualization Functions: get_color_data: Export complete color database data frame create_color_table: Create visual color swatch tables (requires gt package) functions fully vectorized include comprehensive input validation. package now supports extensive database 32,000 color names: 657 R built-colors colors 31,852+ colors color-names database (https://github.com/meodai/color-names) Key Features: Case-insensitive color name matching Backward compatible R's color system (R colors prioritized) Fast lookup using pre-built internal databases Minimal dependencies (grDevices) Comprehensive test coverage extended database stored internally R/sysdata.rda automatically loaded package attached. Users can seamlessly work R colors extended color palette.

title: col2hex2col: Convert Between Color Names and Hex Codes — col2hex2col-package
text: Maintainer: Antti Rask anttilennartrask@gmail.com contributors: Yann Cohen (iamYannC) [contributor]

what: Convert Color Names to Hex Codes — color_to_hex
title: Convert Color Names to Hex Codes — color_to_hex
text: Converts color names hexadecimal color code representations. function accepts color names extensive database 32,000 color names, including 657 built-R colors colors plus comprehensive color-names database https://github.com/meodai/color-names.

title: Convert Color Names to Hex Codes — color_to_hex
Convert Color Names to Hex Codes — color_to_hex
text: color character vector color names (e.g., "red", "blue", "sunset orange"). Color names case-insensitive whitespace trimmed. Spaces within color names preserved (e.g., "sky blue" different "skyblue").

title: Convert Color Names to Hex Codes — color_to_hex
text: character vector hexadecimal color codes format "#RRGGBB", pair characters represents red, green, blue components hexadecimal notation (00-FF). returned vector length input.

title: Convert Color Names to Hex Codes — color_to_hex
text: function performs input validation raise error : input character vector NA values present invalid color names provided function vectorized efficiently handles single colors vectors multiple colors. extended database includes 32,462 unique color names various sources, making suitable wide range color specification needs. Color name matching case-insensitive: "Red", "red", "RED" match color.

title: Convert Color Names to Hex Codes — color_to_hex
code: # Convert a single color color_to_hex("red") #> [1] "#FF0000"  # Convert multiple colors color_to_hex(c("red", "blue", "green")) #> [1] "#FF0000" "#0000FF" "#00FF00"  # Works with all R color names color_to_hex(c("skyblue", "coral", "chartreuse")) #> [1] "#87CEEB" "#FF7F50" "#7FFF00"  # Also works with extended color names color_to_hex(c("sunset orange", "arctic ocean", "forest green")) #> [1] "#FD5E53" "#66C3D0" "#154406"  # Case insensitive color_to_hex(c("Red", "BLUE", "Green")) #> [1] "#FF0000" "#0000FF" "#00FF00"  # Use in a data visualization context colors <- c("steelblue", "firebrick", "forestgreen") hex_codes <- color_to_hex(colors) # hex_codes can now be used with plotting functions

title: Create Color Swatch Table — create_color_table
text: Creates visual table displaying color names, hex codes, color swatches. Requires gt package installed.

title: Create Color Swatch Table — create_color_table
text: df data frame minimum column named hex containing hexadecimal color codes. additional columns included table. first column (hex) automatically labeled "Color Name" output table, regardless original name.

title: Create Color Swatch Table — create_color_table
text: gt table object displaying colors visual swatches. table columns color names (provided), hex codes, color swatch column cell filled corresponding color.

title: Create Color Swatch Table — create_color_table
text: function creates enhanced table using gt package. table includes: Color names (name column exists input) Hexadecimal color codes Visual color swatches (cells filled actual colors) gt package must installed use function. installed, function provide instructions install . can pass output get_color_data directly function, create custom data frame color selection.

title: Create Color Swatch Table — create_color_table
code: # Create a table with a few colors colors_df <- data.frame(   name = c("red", "blue", "forestgreen"),   hex = c("#FF0000", "#0000FF", "#228B22") )  # Only run if gt is available if (requireNamespace("gt", quietly = TRUE)) {   create_color_table(colors_df)    # Use with get_color_data() - show first 10 colors   all_colors <- get_color_data()   create_color_table(head(all_colors, 10))    # Create a table with only specific colors   blue_colors <- all_colors[grepl("blue", all_colors$name), ]   create_color_table(head(blue_colors, 20))    # Minimal example with just hex codes   hex_only <- data.frame(hex = c("#FF0000", "#00FF00", "#0000FF"))   create_color_table(hex_only) }     Hex Code       Swatch     #FF0000 #00FF00 #0000FF

title: Get Color Database — get_color_data
text: Returns complete color database data frame containing 32,000+ color names corresponding hexadecimal codes.

title: Get Color Database — get_color_data
text: data frame following columns: name Character vector color names (lowercase) hex Character vector hexadecimal color codes (uppercase, format: #RRGGBB) lab_l, lab_a, lab_b (Optional) LAB color space coordinates, added farver package available data frame contains 32,462 rows representing available colors, including R's 657 built-colors extended color-names database.

title: Get Color Database — get_color_data
text: returned data frame sorted alphabetically color name. color name maps exactly one hex code, though multiple color names may share hex code. function useful : Exploring available color names Creating custom color palettes Searching colors name pattern Analyzing color distributions Building color visualization tools

what: Convert Hex Codes to Color Names — hex_to_color
title: Convert Hex Codes to Color Names — hex_to_color
text: Converts hexadecimal color codes corresponding color names. function searches extensive database 32,000 color names, prioritizing R's built-color names available.

title: Convert Hex Codes to Color Names — hex_to_color
Convert Hex Codes to Color Names — hex_to_color
text: hex character vector hexadecimal color codes format "#RRGGBB" "#RRGGBBAA" (e.g., "#FF0000", "#0000FF", "#FF0000FF"). hash symbol (#) required, hex code case-insensitive. component (RR, GG, BB) must two-digit hexadecimal value (00-FF). 8-digit code alpha channel (AA) provided, alpha channel ignored. fallback_nearest_color Logical. TRUE (default), hex code exact match database, function find nearest named color using LAB color distance. Requires farver package. FALSE, unmatched hex codes return NA. fallback_distance Character. color distance metric use fallback matching. Currently "lab" supported.

title: Convert Hex Codes to Color Names — hex_to_color
text: character vector color names (lowercase). hex code corresponding named color database fallback_nearest_color = FALSE, NA returned element. fallback_nearest_color = TRUE, nearest named color returned instead (warning). returned vector length input.

title: Convert Hex Codes to Color Names — hex_to_color
text: function performs input validation raise error : input character vector NA values present hex codes correct "#RRGGBB" "#RRGGBBAA" format function case-insensitive hex values (e.g., "#FF0000" "#ff0000" treated identically). 8-digit hex codes alpha channel provided (e.g., "#FF0000FF"), alpha channel automatically stripped RGB portion used color name lookup. Name Selection Strategy: multiple color names map hex code: R's built-color names prioritized (colors) R color exists, shortest name extended database returned ensures backward compatibility R's color system providing coverage 32,161 unique hex codes extended database. extended database includes colors https://github.com/meodai/color-names, significantly increasing likelihood finding named match given hex code.

title: Convert Hex Codes to Color Names — hex_to_color
code: # Convert a single hex code hex_to_color("#FF0000") #> [1] "red"  # Convert multiple hex codes hex_to_color(c("#FF0000", "#0000FF", "#00FF00")) #> [1] "red"   "blue"  "green"  # Works with 8-digit hex codes (alpha channel ignored) hex_to_color(c("#FF0000FF", "#0000FFFF")) #> [1] "red"  "blue"  # Case insensitive hex_to_color("#ff0000")  # Same as "#FF0000" #> [1] "red"  # Works with extended color database hex_to_color("#FF6347")  # Returns a descriptive color name #> [1] "tomato"  # Fallback to nearest color when no exact match (default behavior) hex_to_color("#859900")  # Returns nearest named color with a warning #> Warning: Hex value(s) #859900 have no exact match; falling back using lab distance. #> [1] "bioshock"  # Disable fallback to get NA for unmatched colors hex_to_color("#859900", fallback_nearest_color = FALSE) #> [1] NA  # Round-trip conversion original <- c("red", "blue", "green") hex_codes <- color_to_hex(original) hex_to_color(hex_codes)  # Returns original color names #> [1] "red"   "blue"  "green"

title: col2hex2col 0.5.1
text: Updated README examples show LAB columns get_color_data() output Added note LAB columns requiring farver package Updated contributor information pkgdown configuration Cleaned repository structure (moved dev files .dev/ folder)

title: col2hex2col 0.5.0
text: LAB columns now display “Lab L”, “Lab ”, “Lab b” instead raw column names First column automatically labeled “Color Name” regardless input column name

title: col2hex2col 0.5.0
text: Fixed hex_to_color() examples use hex codes without exact matches Fixed get_color_data() row numbering alphabetical sorting

title: col2hex2col 0.5.0
text: Updated documentation examples correct output

title: col2hex2col 0.4.0
text: exact match exists, returns closest named color using LAB color distance Requires optional farver package color distance calculations New fallback_nearest_color parameter (default: TRUE) enable/disable fallback New fallback_distance parameter get LAB distance matched color

title: col2hex2col 0.4.0
text: Added Yann Cohen (@iamYannC) contributor fallback functionality

title: col2hex2col 0.3.1
text: CRAN release: 2026-01-21

title: col2hex2col 0.3.1
text: Automatically strips alpha channel #RRGGBBAA format codes Maintains backward compatibility 6-digit #RRGGBB format Works seamlessly paletteer packages output colors transparency

title: col2hex2col 0.3.1
text: Added 7 new tests 8-digit hex code support hex_to_color() 111 tests passing

title: col2hex2col 0.3.0
text: Returns 32,462 color names hex codes Data frame format makes easy explore, filter, analyze colors Sorted alphabetically color name Perfect creating custom color palettes searching specific colors Displays colors names, hex codes, visual color swatches Uses gt package beautiful formatted tables Works seamlessly get_color_data() output Optional dependency - requires gt want use feature

title: col2hex2col 0.3.0
text: Added gt Suggests (optional dependency create_color_table()) Package maintains zero hard dependencies - pure base R core functions

title: col2hex2col 0.3.0
text: Added 18 new tests get_color_data() Added 8 new tests create_color_table() (proper handling optional gt dependency) 104 tests passing

title: col2hex2col 0.2.0
text: 657 R built-colors (backward compatible) 31,852 colors color-names database (MIT license) Total: 32,462 unique color names, 32,161 unique hex codes Case-insensitive matching (“red”, “Red”, “RED” work) Whitespace trimming Examples: “sunset orange”, “arctic ocean”, “forest green” R colors always prioritized available non-R colors, returns shortest available name Significantly increased hex code coverage (~650 32,161)

title: col2hex2col 0.2.0
text: None - fully backward compatible v0.1.x existing code using R colors work unchanged R colors prioritized lookups

title: col2hex2col 0.2.0
text: Replaced dynamic color lookup pre-built internal databases Removed dependency grDevices functions lookups Fast constant-time lookup using named vectors stored R/sysdata.rda

title: col2hex2col 0.2.0
text: Updated function documentation reflect extended database Added examples using extended color names Updated package description README Enhanced package-level documentation key features

title: col2hex2col 0.2.0
text: Added 22 new tests extended color functionality 67 tests passing Tests cover backward compatibility, case insensitivity, extended colors

title: col2hex2col 0.2.0
text: Added data-raw/prepare_colornames.R script data preparation Internal data stored R/sysdata.rda (~650KB) Removed grDevices Imports (longer needed)

title: col2hex2col 0.1.2
text: Fixed duplicate “Author” “See Also” sections package documentation

title: col2hex2col 0.1.1
text: Enhanced function documentation comprehensive details Added @details sections explaining input validation Expanded examples real-world use cases Added cross-references @seealso sections Improved package-level documentation examples verified run correctly

title: col2hex2col 0.1.0
text: Added color_to_hex() function convert R color names hexadecimal codes Added hex_to_color() function convert hexadecimal codes R color names Comprehensive input validation functions Full test coverage testthat Optimized performance using base R instead tidyverse CRAN-ready package structure
